summary: ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, WHILE DRIVING, THE CHECK ENGINE SOON LIGHT CAME ON, THE VEHICLE STARTED TO SHAKE AND THE VEHICLE HAD NO POWER.  TWO OF THE FOUR IGNITION COILS HAD FAILED AND WERE REPLACED.   CONSUMER FELT IT WOULD HAVE BEEN MORE COST EFFECTIVE IF ALL FOUR IGNITION COILS WERE REPLACED.  HOWEVER DEALERSHIP CLAIMED THAT WAS AGAINST COMPANY POLICY.  *TT   *NLM
